events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has classified this case under the Refund category based on customer request for money back.
This support case has been assigned to agent Sarah Williams for further assistance.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your incorrect order.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to start the refund procedure?
Here is a photo of the product I got, which is different from what I ordered. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Looking forward to the confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should reflect in your account shortly.
We wanted to check if your refund arrived as expected and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successful and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed. Thank you!
